content: भरण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [भृ-ल्यु-ल्युट् वा] Bearing, maintaining, supporting, nourishing. --णं {@--1@} The act of nourishing, maintaining or supporting; <ls>R. 1. 24</ls>; <ls>Ś. 7. 33.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) The act of bearing or carrying. ({%b%}) Wearing, putting on. {@--3@} Bringing or procuring. {@--4@} Nutriment. {@--5@} Hire, wages. --णः The constellation Bharaṇī.
